location details.area_details: The main work location is Agri Square Shinjuku, 5-27-11 Sendagaya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo. Office work is generally required on days other than Wednesdays at the office in Shibuya-ku, Tokyo.
location details.future_workplace_detail: There is a possibility of changing the work location to a place designated by the company.
location details.transfer_detail: There is a possibility of changing the work location to a place designated by the company.

remote work details.remote_detail: Remote work is available every Wednesday. Employees can choose between office work or working from home on Wednesdays. The company also offers flexible working arrangements through Timely Shift and Monthly Shift systems. The basic working hours are 9:00-18:00, but can be adjusted up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments using the Timely Shift system.

smoking prevention details.smoking_prevention_detail: Indoor smoking ban policy adopted. No smoking areas are provided inside the office. Measures to prevent passive smoking are in place.

age and gender.age_genders: There is no clear description of age restrictions, but since it is full-time employment, it is assumed to target the general working age. There is no description of gender restrictions or preferences. It is assumed that applications are possible regardless of gender.

employment type period.employment_type_remarks: Full-time employee with no fixed term of employment.
employment type period.employment_period_detail: Employment as a full-time employee with no fixed term.

trial period.trial_period_memo: There is a 6-month trial period, and there are no changes in conditions during this period.

job posting.offer_background: Full-time position in Shibuya, Tokyo. Experience in database design, implementation, and data manipulation using SQL is required.
job posting.job_description:
1. Data quality check and maintenance of operational rules using tools like Great Expectations.
2. Data visualization support using BI tools like Looker and Tableau.
3. Proposing improvements for data input efficiency and supporting business improvements using data.
4. Centralized management of various internal data and providing it in an easily accessible format for each department.
5. Data collection and processing using cloud technologies like BigQuery and APIs of various SaaS products.
6. Utilizing the latest technologies such as ETL tools and BI tools for data analysis.
job posting.job_charm_details1: Work in a data analysis team that closely collaborates with various departments, making proposals for data utilization and improvements.
job posting.job_charm_details2: Use of cutting-edge technologies and tools in the field of data analysis and visualization.
job posting.job_charm_details3: Opportunity to work on a wide range of data from various business departments and contribute to business improvements.
job posting.future_job_description_detail: After joining, you may be involved in understanding the company's data management system, data preprocessing, and designing and implementing data models.

salary_fixed_allowances_attributes.fixed_allowance_memo: Family allowance, overtime allowance, late-night allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, business trip allowance

salary_variable_allowances_attributes.variable_allowance_memo: Overtime allowance equivalent to 20 hours per month regardless of whether overtime work is performed

salary information.allowance_detail: Family allowance, overtime allowance, late-night allowance, holiday work allowance, commuting allowance, relocation allowance, business trip allowance
salary information.salary_detail: Annual income ranges from 5,493,636 yen to 7,687,392 yen. Includes basic salary, overtime allowance, and other allowances.
salary information.allowance_commute_detail: Commuting allowance provided up to 100,000 yen per month
salary information.salary_railse_memo: Conducted once a year in May

job working hour.working_hours_detail: Working hours are from 9:00 to 18:00. With the Timely Shift system, you can change your working hours by up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments.
job working hour.working_hours_condition: Complete two-day weekends (Saturday and Sunday), public holidays, New Year's holidays, summer holidays, paid leave (over 93% utilization rate), maternity leave, and special leave for celebratory or mourning occasions are included. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. The Timely Shift system allows changing work hours by up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments daily or monthly. The Rakus Smile system allows employees to choose suitable working hours and evaluation styles during child-rearing periods, available after one year of employment. 5 days of nursing leave per child is available, separate from regular paid leave. Backup leave is available for emergencies or special situations.

recruiment and hiring.prerequisite: Experience in database design and implementation, and experience in data extraction and manipulation using SQL are required. Experience in big data or data analysis platform construction, and experience in business improvement using IT are welcome.
recruiment and hiring.strictness: 6-month probation period with no change in conditions.
recruiment and hiring.selection_process: Document screening, 1st interview (with field staff and HR staff), aptitude test, final interview (with executives)

holidays and leaves.holidays_remarks: Full two-day weekend system (Saturday and Sunday), public holidays, New Year's holidays, summer holidays, paid leave (consumption rate over 93%), maternity leave, special leave (e.g., 7 days for marriage). Annual paid leave is granted with a consumption rate of over 93% (as of March 2023). Maternity leave is provided with a 100% return rate after taking it. Special leave is granted, for example, 7 days of leave for marriage. Every Wednesday, employees can choose between office work or remote work. Time Shift System allows changing working hours up to 1 hour before or after in 30-minute increments daily or monthly. Monthly Shift System allows changing working hours on a monthly basis. Child nursing leave is available. Backup leave is available for special circumstances. Child nursing leave provides 5 days per child, separate from regular paid leave. Backup leave is an additional leave system for emergencies or special circumstances.

welfare insurance.welfare: Casual dress code, family allowance, work-from-home days, timely shift system, qualification acquisition support, child nursing leave, babysitter subsidy system, backup leave, in-house clubs, in-house social events, transportation allowance up to 100,000 yen per month, family allowance (30,000 yen/month for 1 child, 50,000 yen/month for 2 children, 60,000 yen/month for 3 or more children until age 18, excluding assistant managers and above), qualification acquisition support system, babysitter subsidy system, in-house clubs (baseball, futsal, light music, Gunpla, etc.), in-house social events, indoor smoking ban
